title: Publisher::WaitForConnection() is being used without timeout

content.raw:
I have observed occasional hangs at [Publisher::WaitForConnection()](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/gazebo/transport/Publisher.cc?at=default#cl-71), which has a potentially infinite loop. There is an alternative version of the function with takes a `common::Time` as a timeout argument, but it's only being used by [gzlog.cc:959](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/tools/gzlog.cc?at=default#cl-959).

The function is called without a timeout in the following places:

* [gzfactory.cc:118](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/tools/gzfactory.cc#cl-118)
* [gzfactory.cc:156](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/tools/gzfactory.cc#cl-156)
* [Scene.cc:289](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/gazebo/rendering/Scene.cc?at=default#cl-289)
* [Transport.cc:212](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/gazebo/transport/Transport.cc?at=default#cl-212)
* [Node.hh:54](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/gazebo/transport/Node.hh?at=default#cl-54)
* [test/ServerFixture.hh:174-175](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/test/ServerFixture.hh?at=default#cl-174)
* [test/regression/state_log.cc:83](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/test/regression/state_log.cc?at=default#cl-83)
* [test/regression/state_log.cc:150](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/test/regression/state_log.cc?at=default#cl-150)
* [test/regression/transport.cc:118](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/test/regression/transport.cc?at=default#cl-118)
* [examples/stand_alone/publisher/publisher.cc:45](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/a92e30bd1d5f9bb3162be05cc910da0843892a03/examples/stand_alone/publisher/publisher.cc?at=default#cl-45)

Seeing Scene.cc in this list makes me think of issue #681 (blank gzclient windows on startup).

I have observed occasional hangs at Publisher::WaitForConnection(), which has a potentially infinite loop. There is an alternative version of the function with takes a common::Time as a timeout argument, but it's only being used by gzlog.cc:959.

The function is called without a timeout in the following places:

  • gzfactory.cc:118
  • gzfactory.cc:156
  • Scene.cc:289
  • Transport.cc:212
  • Node.hh:54
  • test/ServerFixture.hh:174-175
  • test/regression/state_log.cc:83
  • test/regression/state_log.cc:150
  • test/regression/transport.cc:118
  • examples/stand_alone/publisher/publisher.cc:45

Seeing Scene.cc in this list makes me think of issue #681 (blank gzclient windows on startup).
